channel.title: Urgent help!
channel.description: i have a 317.. im useing hybrid pvp source when i change the hp of a npc it doesnt do anything yes i compile it.. also how do i change the combat...and another thing how to a put a npc in the db?

item.title: Urgent help!
item.dc:creator: @michael509 michael509
item.description:
@michael509 wrote:

but i did it to the client side n this is where it gave me the error… i know that server side is where u change hp n atk n def… where as client side u change name combat and desciption…

but i cant figure out what i am doing wrong client wise…

my server compiles and runs fine… but my client compile gives me 15 errors when i try to add it…

if anyone can help me plz pm me and ill pm back with msn or skype info which ever you prefer.

Read full topic

item.title: Urgent help!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

You’re mixing server-side and client-side modifications. The health is set server-side, whereas the combat level and such is set client-side (in the cache).

Read full topic

item.title: Urgent help!
item.dc:creator: @michael509 michael509
item.description:
@michael509 wrote:

[quote=“ezzi, post:2, topic:433156”]Go to entityDef.java and do this:

if(i == ####) { // NPC ID entityDef.actions = new String[5]; entityDef.actions[1] = "Attack"; entityDef.name = "##"; // NPC name entityDef.combatLevel = ###; //combat level entityDef.description = "#####".getBytes(); // NPC description }
ok so #### is the npc ID you want to change, so if I want to change a man combat to level 100 I would do this
if(i == 2) {
entityDef.combatLevel = 100;
}
if Iwwant to make him level 100 with a new name and description I do this
if(i == 2) {
entityDef.combatLevel= 100;
entityDef.name = “Ezzi”;
entityDef.description = “Look it’s ezzi!”.getBytes();
}

to change hp you go to the npc.cfg file and change it there[/quote]

Ok so i did exactly this… and i get 15 errors… what is the cause of this?

Read full topic

item.title: Urgent help!
item.dc:creator: @ezzi ezzi
item.description:
@ezzi wrote:

you have to tab only space after
spawn(space)=(space)###(tab)X(tab)y ETC.

Read full topic

item.title: Urgent help!
item.dc:creator: @torch1 torch
item.description:
@torch1 wrote:

thanks alot it worked ;D ima newb i learn fast tho ok when i go in the spawn config i keep gettin number error when i try to change the max hit , def, att, etc is their a certain amout of spaces u must put in? because im adding a npc to this new area which its a new boss its not seeming to work

Read full topic

item.title: Urgent help!
item.dc:creator: @ezzi ezzi
item.description:
@ezzi wrote:

Go to entityDef.java and do this:

if(i == ####) { // NPC ID entityDef.actions = new String[5]; entityDef.actions[1] = "Attack"; entityDef.name = "##"; // NPC name entityDef.combatLevel = ###; //combat level entityDef.description = "#####".getBytes(); // NPC description }
ok so #### is the npc ID you want to change, so if I want to change a man combat to level 100 I would do this
if(i == 2) {
entityDef.combatLevel = 100;
}
if Iwwant to make him level 100 with a new name and description I do this
if(i == 2) {
entityDef.combatLevel= 100;
entityDef.name = “Ezzi”;
entityDef.description = “Look it’s ezzi!”.getBytes();
}

to change hp you go to the npc.cfg file and change it there

Read full topic
